name: Website Cleaner - Photobucket
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain(photobucket.com) { 
div#cellAd, 
span.breadcrumbLabel, 
div#collapsable-ad-id-PROMO, 
span#containerAlbumPartnerLinksBC, 
td#advPanelContainer, 
td#cellTopSearches_FooterSearch, 
td#cellImageCounter_FooterSearch, 
div#panelFooterSearch, 
div#topNavBar, 
div#panelSubAlbums, 
div#containerBreadcrumb, 
a#tab_mobile, 
td#panelAlbumLeft, 
td#navTabs, 
iframe#ad, 
div#containerPitch, 
div#panelAbout, 
div#promoModule, 
div#moduleContents, 
div#profileListContainer, 
div#panelAdv, 
div#panelAnnouncements, 
div#lbContent, 
div#overlay, 
div#containerSqAd, 
td#cellPromo, 
div#panelFeaturedMedia,
li#columnLeft_po { display: none !important; } 
}
